title: EU Wants ESMA to Oversee Crypto Like the SEC Does in US
description: The European Commission formally proposed transferring direct supervision of all crypto asset service providers to the European Securities and Markets...
content:
The European Commission formally proposed transferring direct supervision of all crypto asset service providers to the European Securities and Markets Authority.
This supervision was previously plac… [+4659 chars]
